Name: AdaINStyleTransfer
Description: Adaptive instance normalization for style transfer. Applies the mean and stddev of the first connection to all subsequent connections.

MandatoryArgs.Name: connections
MandatoryArgs.Description: List of nodes. The first node sets the style which is applied to all subsequent nodes.

Functions.Name: execute

MandatoryArgs.Name: inputs
MandatoryArgs.Description: A tf.Tensor from each input connection.

Functions.Description: Performs instance normalization on the last axis of the inputs. Transfers style from the first connection to the subsequent connections.

Functions.Name: exportNode

MandatoryArgs.Name: path
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Returns.Description: The access path used. This is used for overloading.

Functions.Description: Exports ID, and connections. Checks directory existence and validity.
